Title: Increases and modifies the penalties associated with passing a stopped school bus when using a portable electronic device or mobile telephone
Summary: Relates to increasing and modifying the penalties associated with passing a stopped school bus when using a portable electronic device; such minimum and maximum values for such fines shall be doubled.
LawCode: Amd ยง1174, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to increasing and modifying the penalties associated with passing a stopped school bus when using a portable electronic device or mobile telephone
